verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH4428>, when all the kings of the Amorites<WH567>, that were beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> westward<WH3220>, and all the kings<WH4428> of the Canaanites<WH3669>, that were by the sea<WH3220>, heard<WH8085> how that Jehovah<WH3068> had dried up<WH3001> the waters<WH4325> of the Jordan<WH3383> from before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, until we were passed over<WH5674>, that their heart<WH3824> melted<WH4549>, neither was there spirit<WH7307> in them any more<WH6440>, because of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

At that time<WH6256> Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Make<WH6213> thee knives<WH2719> of flint<WH6697>, and circumcise<WH4135> again<WH7725> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> the second time<WH8145>.
And Joshua<WH3091> made<WH6213> him knives<WH2719> of flint<WH6697>, and circumcised<WH4135> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> at the hill<WH1389> of the foreskins<WH6190>.

And this is the cause<WH1697> why Joshua<WH3091> did circumcise<WH4135>: all the people<WH5971> that came forth out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714>, that were males<WH2145>, even all the men<WH582> of war<WH4421>, died<WH4191> in the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870>, after they came forth out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714>.

For <WH3588> all the people<WH5971> that came out<WH3318> were circumcised<WH4135>; but all the people<WH5971> that were born<WH3209> in the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> as they came forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714>, they had not circumcised<WH4135>.

For the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> forty<WH705> years<WH8141> in the wilderness<WH4057>, till all the nation<WH1471>, even the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> that came forth out<WH3318> of Egypt<WH4714>, were consumed<WH8552>, because they hearkened<WH8085> not unto the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068>: unto whom Jehovah<WH3068> sware<WH7650> that he would not let them see<WH7200> the land<WH776> which Jehovah<WH3068> sware<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1> that he would give<WH5414> us<WH776>, a land flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>.

And their children<WH1121>, whom he raised up<WH6965> in their stead<WH3091>, them did Joshua circumcise<WH4135>: for they were uncircumcised<WH6189>, because they had not circumcised<WH4135> them by the way<WH1870>.
And it came to pass<WH8552>, when they had done circumcising<WH4135> all the nation<WH1471>, that they abode<WH3427> in their places in the camp<WH4264>, till they were whole<WH2421>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, This day<WH3117> have I rolled away<WH1556> the reproach<WH2781> of Egypt<WH4714> from off you<WH8034>. Wherefore the name of that place<WH4725> was called<WH7121> Gilgal<WH1537>, unto this day<WH3117>.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> encamped<WH2583> in Gilgal<WH1537>; and they kept<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> on the fourteenth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320> at even<WH6153> in the plains<WH6160> of Jericho<WH3405>.

And they did eat<WH398> of the produce<WH5669> of the land<WH776> on the morrow<WH4283> after the passover<WH6453>, unleavened cakes<WH4682> and parched<WH7033> grain<WH6106>, in the selfsame day<WH3117>.

And the manna<WH4478> ceased<WH7673> on the morrow<WH4283>, after they had eaten<WH398> of the produce<WH5669> of the land<WH776>; neither had the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> manna<WH4478> any more<WH398>; but they did eat of the fruit<WH8393> of the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> that year<WH8141>.

And it came to pass<WH3091>, when Joshua was by Jericho<WH3405>, that he lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> and looked<WH7200>, and<WH5975>, behold, there stood a man<WH376> over against him with his sword<WH2719> drawn<WH8025> in his hand<WH3027>: and Joshua<WH3091> went<WH3212> unto him<WH559>, and said unto him<WH6862>, Art thou for us, or for our adversaries?

And he said<WH559>, Nay<WH8269>; but as prince of the host<WH6635> of Jehovah<WH3068> am I now come<WH935>. And Joshua<WH3091> fell<WH5307> on his face<WH6440> to the earth<WH776>, and did worship<WH7812>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH559>, What saith my lord<WH113> unto his servant<WH5650>?

And the prince<WH8269> of Jehovah<WH3068>'s host<WH6635> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Put off<WH5394> thy shoe<WH5275> from off thy foot<WH7272>; for the place<WH4725> whereon thou standest<WH5975> is holy<WH6944>. And Joshua<WH3091> did so<WH6213>.
